cast.overview: Following the tragic death of her teenage son, Manuela travels from Madrid to Barcelona in an attempt to contact the long-estranged father the boy never knew. She reunites with an old friend, an outspoken transgender sex worker, and befriends a troubled actress and a pregnant, HIV-positive nun.
cast.title: All About My Mother

crew.overview: Following the tragic death of her teenage son, Manuela travels from Madrid to Barcelona in an attempt to contact the long-estranged father the boy never knew. She reunites with an old friend, an outspoken transgender sex worker, and befriends a troubled actress and a pregnant, HIV-positive nun.
crew.title: All About My Mother

details.biography: Cayetana Guillén Cuervo was born on June 13, 1969 in Madrid, Madrid, Spain. She is an actress and writer, known for Versión española (1998), ¡Atención obras! (2013) and Días de cine (1991). She has been married to Omar Ayyashi since June 4, 2005.
details.name: Cayetana Guillén Cuervo
